patthana21.16:4.1: Nadassanena pahātabbaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nadassanena pahātabbo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:5.1: Nadassanena pahātabbaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā dassanena pahātabbo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:5.2: Nadassanena pahātabbaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nadassanena pahātabbo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:6.1: Nadassanena pahātabbaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:6.2: Nanadassanena pahātabbaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:6.4: Hetuyā dve, adhipatiyā dve … pe … avigate dve.
patthana21.16:7.1: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nabhāvanāya pahātabbo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:9.1: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nadassanena pahātabbahetuko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:11.1: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:13.1: Nasavitakkaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā savitakko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:15.1: Nasavicāraṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā savicāro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:17.1: Nasappītikaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sappītiko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:19.1: Napītisahagataṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā pītisahagato kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:21.1: Nasukhasahagataṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sukhasahagato kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:23.1: Naupekkhāsahagataṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā upekkhāsahagato kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:25.1: Nanakāmāvacaraṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nakāmāvacaro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:25.2: Nanakāmāvacaraṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kāmāvacaro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:27.1: Narūpāvacaraṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā rūpāvacaro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:27.2: Narūpāvacaraṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā narūpāvacaro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:29.1: Naarūpāvacaraṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā arūpāvacaro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:29.2: Naarūpāvacaraṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naarūpāvacaro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:31.1: Naapariyāpannaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā apariyāpanno kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:31.2: Naapariyāpannaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā pariyāpanno kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:33.1: Naniyyānikaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā niyyāniko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:33.2: Naniyyānikaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naaniyyāniko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:35.1: Naniyataṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā niyato kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:35.2: Naniyataṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā aniyato kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:37.1: Naanuttaraṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anuttaro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:37.2: Naanuttaraṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sauttaro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:39.1: Nasaraṇaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā araṇo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:40.1: Nasaraṇaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā saraṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:41.1: Nasaraṇaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:41.2: Naaraṇaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:41.4: Hetuyā dve, adhipatiyā dve … pe … avigate dve.
